price: „Тражим заштиту Свемилосног од тебе, ако се Њега бојиш!“ Узвикну она.
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālat innī aʿūdhu bil-raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyan
